front.title: Toward the Definition of the SIP Events Package for SPIRITS Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes the definition of the SIP Event Package for SPIRITS, based on on the structure defined in [1], the SPIRITS protocol requirements documented in [2], the overall SPIRITS Architecture presented in RFC 3136 [3], the discussion at the Salt Lake City meeting, and the subsequent decisions. To this end, the document defines the package and event names, and addresses the SUBSCRIBE paramaters.
